version_description:
The new sequel to Tasty Planet is out - it's called "Tasty Blue"! Check it out on the app store.

In this version of Tasty Planet you'll find:
Bug fixes and compatibility fixes for new iOS version.

-More accurate and smoother tilt controls
-MFi controller support
-64-bit support
The whole game has been remastered with brand new artwork!
-Support for new iPhone screen sizes (fills the screen without black bars on sides).
